Name: Christian Brothers - St Francis Xavier Province

About.Acquisition focus: Internal documents arising since the establishment of province in 1967. Some registers, annals, annuals and photographs of schools the Brothers have vacated.

About.Major holdings: Christian Brothers Incorporated: Educational records (books) 1890-1995(6m); Our studies (books) 1926-1995(6m); School annuals (10m); Correspondence 1965-1993 (10m); Plans and photographs (10m); School records 1967-(20m); Financial Records 1965-1993 (25m). Xavier Teachers' College: Records 1967- (2m). News cuttings and House Annals (2m).
